page.title: 01The Survey Area.
page.content: Our survey area is centred oaround the villge of Cold Norton. Now, we know for a fact that this is a very old village for we have evidence that the village was mentioned in the original Domesday Book of 1086. However, most of the present village has been built in the last twenty years and the great majority of families now living here have only moved in recently. Many of the people living in or around the village work away from the village, often in London or places a little nearer such as Basildon. The area around the village is largely rural, being used for the farming of crops. Few animals are kept on farms in the area.
